name: Dungeon Game?!?
description:
Cutest dungeon ever, with cats, amogus guys, and... goats?

Adventure downward, checking for secret passages in the walls.  Find all three pieces of treasure (and the goat). Then, meow.

Murr...

Purr...

Meow...

Check out my other pieces of interactive fiction =^_^=

And last of all, talk to the cat. Cats have good advice.
